name: FPlayerKeyMapping
doc: Represents a single key mapping that is set by the player

MappingName: The name of the mapping for this key
DisplayName: Localized display name of this mapping
DisplayCategory: Localized display category of this mapping
Slot: What slot this key is mapped to
DefaultKey: The default key that this mapping was set to in its input mapping context
CurrentKey: The key that the player has mapped to
HardwareDeviceId: An optional Hardware Device specifier for this mapping
AssociatedInputAction: The input action associated with this player key mapping
bIsDirty: True if this key mapping is dirty (i.e. has been changed by the player)
